name: Rudiment Rock-It
description:
Rudiment Rock-It is an entertaining game for everyone, particularly percussionists. Play it to quickly learn drum rudiments. Perform the rudiment correctly and evenly to beat each level. The faster you play the rudiment, the more points you get. But don’t go faster than you can handle or you’ll crash!

Tap the correct side of the screen to fire your engines in the correct sequence. For example, the given sequence might be RLRR LRLL. Tap this sequence repeatedly and your rocket will propel itself to rudimentary excellence!
